title: Oil Pump Inspection

body.body: Inspect the sprocket and chain for wear and/or damage. Replace the pump and chain if wear is found.
Check the shaft and shaft bearings for side and end float. Replace the pump if wear is found.
Carry out a visual inspection for corrosion and scale build-up around the coolant pump impeller and in the coolant pump body. Replace the pump assembly if necessary.
